no_personajes_suficientes: Not enough characters to form a team.
team_recom_best_epi: These are the best epiphanies recommended for this team
haru_epi_2: Increases the number of Anchor Shot hits and removes the charge requirement
haru_epi_3: Increases the number of uses of Anchor Pointer
haru_epi_5: If you didn’t get the critical chance upgrade, this is a decent option
haru_epi_6: Adds permanent Retain to Anchor Shot
haru_epi_7: Situational but decent if you have good crit.
haru_epi_9: Activates once more if it kills
haru_epi_12: Change to Upgrade, it's a permanent buff
haru_epi_13: Turns the buff additive so it improves Anchor Shot by +1 hit
haru_epi_14: Helps cycle and draw attack cards
haru_set_1: Boosts Haru's critical chance by 20% on many of her cards
khalipe_epi_2: Allows you to choose what to draw.
khalipe_epi_3: Increases the original's damage and shield.
khalipe_epi_vulture_5: Gives more shield the more cards you have.
khalipe_epi_overpower_1: Provides extra tenacity that helps recover AP.
khalipe_epi_overpower_2: Good general option, weaken and vulnerable are good debuffs.
khalipe_epi_overpower_3: If played at the start of the turn or when drawing cards, it can provide a lot of shield.
khalipe_epi_greatsword_3: Adds retrieve, which increases the number of times it can be used.
khalipe_set_1: Increases critical chance for almost her entire kit.
khalipe_set_2: Triple set, general for many characters.
khalipe_set_3: Khalipe has a lot of tenacity so she can activate the set (situational).
khalipe_set_4: If you have any card draw it can be useful (situational).
tressa_epi_1: Allows creating infinite daggers when healing.
tressa_epi_unsheathedagger_2: Gains exhaust and generates 2 more daggers, works well with the Shadow Reload upgrade build.
tressa_epi_unsheathedagger_4: Turns it into an upgrade, generates 1 dagger per turn permanently.
chizuru_epi_onihunt_1: Oni Hunt with 4 hits to charge more Bind.
chizuru_epi_onihunt_2: Creates 2 basic cards with cost 0, helps combo with Tsukuyomi upgrade.
chizuru_epi_onihunt_3: Further increases Shadow of the Moon damage, helps combo with Tsukuyomi +2 hits to Shadow of the Moon.
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_1: Adds +2 hits to Shadow of the Moon (stacks when played multiple times).
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_2: Helps generate much more Bind (stacks when played multiple times).
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_3: Adds 1 hit to the next card and generates more Bind (stacks when played multiple times).
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_4: Upgrade that permanently gives Bind without needing the curse, combos with Tsukuyomi that creates Moonslash.
chizuru_epi_bounddusk_1: Reduces the cost of 2 cards by 1, mitigating not being able to generate AP.
chizuru_epi_bounddusk_2: Activates 2 cards from other characters, very random but mitigates not being able to generate AP.
chizuru_epi_karmicflames_1: Adds 1 hit if the target already has the curse.
chizuru_epi_karmicflames_2: Reduces the cost of the next card by 1 if the target already has the curse.
chizuru_epi_karmicflames_3: Increases damage if the target already has the curse.
chizuru_set_1: Triple set, a good general option.
mika_epi_sourceofwater_1: Adding retain gives you the option to use it in a better situation.
mika_epi_sourceofwater_2: Wave is very general due to AP generation.
mika_epi_sourceofwater_3: Especially useful in teams with lots of healing.
mika_epi_tacticalanalysis_2: Healing, especially useful for Tressa’s Shadow Reload upgrade.
mika_epi_tacticalanalysis_3: Upgrade, so it doesn’t take up space, and increases healing.
mika_epi_tacticalanalysis_4: Double wave is almost 1 AP and doubles healing.
mika_epi_blessingofwaves_1: Provides shield when you are at full HP.
mika_epi_blessingofwaves_2: You can play it after spending all AP as a finisher card.
mika_epi_whirlpool_1: At cost 1, it can provide AP if there are many enemies.
mika_set_1: Increases healing along with defense and survivability.
veronica_epi_repose_1: Repose with cost 0 allows it to be played for free.
veronica_epi_repose_2: Reduces the cost of a drawn card, recovering the value spent.
veronica_epi_sirkowalski_1: Draw 2 cards and generate a crossbow.
veronica_epi_sirkowalski_2: Draw 2 cards and increase the damage of a crossbow.
veronica_epi_firingpreparation_1: AOE crossbow that helps with clearing.
veronica_epi_firingpreparation_2: Chance to generate a double crossbow (as if it were a second critical hit).
veronica_epi_pendantofresolution_1: Makes it unique, it will not appear to be copied in chaos
veronica_epi_pendantofresolution_3: There is a chance to reload 2
yuki_epi_preparetosubdue_1: Draw another attack card next turn
yuki_epi_preparetosubdue_2: If you have Inspiration, draw one more card
yuki_epi_flashslash_1: If you have good AP generation, it provides a lot of damage
yuki_epi_flashslash_2: If you do not have good AP generation, it provides 0 cost
yuki_epi_flashslash_3: Applies vulnerable, increasing damage for the next card
yuki_epi_flashslash_4: Grants morale, increasing damage for the next card
yuki_epi_trickerystrike_1: Adds retrieve with retain, giving it an extra use
yuki_epi_trickerystrike_2: Allows you to choose who receives Inspiration
yuki_epi_frezzingblade_1: Adds initiation at 0 cost, making it free to use
yuki_epi_icebergcleave_1: The most important card in Yuki’s DPS, even without the first dupe
meilin_epi_unityofattackanddefense_1: The most important Mei Lin card, you always look for move
meilin_epi_unityofattackanddefense_2: Only in case you did not get move
meilin_epi_risingdragonspire_1: A strong kick that stacks infinitely with passion cards, especially good with Veronica
meilin_epi_risingdragonspire_2: Kick for Mei Lin basic build
meilin_epi_spiritofthearomata_1: Increases damage based on the number of passion cards used, good with Veronica
meilin_epi_spiritofthearomata_2: Increases damage by 30%, a good general option
meilin_epi_spiritofthearomata_3: Greatly increases basic damage, good for basic builds
beryl_epi_openingfound_1: The upgrade that is the core card of the extra attacks build
beryl_epi_openingfound_2: Adds an extra hit, more damage
beryl_epi_guitypleasure_2: Allows 2 uses of the card and adds Unique, which depending on what you want can be good or bad
beryl_epi_unlimitedfirepower_1: Turns it into an upgrade and provides multiplicative damage increase
beryl_epi_unlimitedfirepower_3: Allows the damage increase to affect others as well, making her a semi-support
nia_epi_adagio_1: Draw 2 and then discard 2, and those return to the draw pile, very good in combo with the forbidden eternal hunger
nia_epi_adagio_2: Does what an adagio does and then creates another one, very useful when played well because the first discard does not go to the top of the draw pile, the second one does
nia_epi_adagio_3: Useful to cycle the DPS or whoever you choose
nia_epi_gchord_1: Allows you to select the card you activate, reducing RNG
nia_epi_gchord_2: Before activating the card, triggers an extra attack; if you get lucky and discard the DPS card, it is extra damage
nia_epi_soulrip_1: Discarding it also triggers the effect, making it free
nia_epi_soulrip_2: For each discard you heal, providing survivability
nia_epi_soulrip_3: Causes an extra attack when you discard, good combo with Renoa
nia_epi_soulrip_4: The upgrade lets you generate a lot of decibel, but the 2 cost is bad
nia_epi_muteaccent_1: Allows you to choose the discard, removing RNG
nia_epi_niacuriosity_1: Allows you to choose a card to draw
rei_epi_snacktime_1: Heals and draws 2 without needing to exhaust
rei_epi_predatorsblade_1: 4 morale is a very strong buff
rei_epi_resonatingdarkness_1: Allows lowering the requirement to 0 or 1 cost, making it work with Mei Lin and others
rei_epi_strikeofdarkness_1: Turns it into an Upgrade, making it a permanent buff
rei_epi_darkcondensation_1: Greatly increases the damage of one card
rei_epi_darkcondensation_2: Increases Void damage, very good for mono-void teams
rei_epi_darkcondensation_3: Allows you to choose a card that is not in your hand
rei_epi_darkcondensation_4: Turns it into an Upgrade and permanent buff, but it is situational because characters often create and remove cards
renoa_epi_echoofsorrow_1: Creates one bullet each turn; having several provides good bullet generation
renoa_epi_floweofdevouredfate_1: Discard 3 and create 3 bullets, generally good
renoa_epi_floweofdevouredfate_2: Increases the damage of the next card
renoa_epi_floweofdevouredfate_3: Can only be played once but creates a large number of bullets at once
renoa_epi_floweofdevouredfate_4: Draws 2 cards, only useful in Renoa support
renoa_epi_balladofpichblack_1: Doubles bullet damage, very good if you are firing many bullets that turn
renoa_epi_instantjudgment_1: Turns it into an Upgrade and hits every turn
renoa_epi_instantjudgment_3: Exhausts a bullet in the graveyard in exchange for more damage
selena_epi_high-powerscope_1: Good card for characters that play many cards, e.g. Sereniel
selena_epi_high-powerscope_2: Turns it into an Upgrade, so it is only played once and applies a mark every turn
selena_epi_high-powerscope_3: Increases mark damage for that turn
selena_epi_targetspotted_1: Turns it into an Upgrade, so it is only played once, a good support card for Sereniel
selena_epi_targetspotted_3: Performs an extra attack when drawn
selena_epi_dronebombing_2: Turns it into an Upgrade and works well with Mei Lin
selena_epi_dronebombing_3: If the DPS character applies Weakness, this is a good option
selena_epi_tacticalmanuever_1: Good support card for Sereniel, helping her combo
selena_set_1: General set, just aim for the best stats
selena_team_1: Good duo with Sereniel, she refills Ravage, allowing Sereniel to perform her combo again
selena_team_2: Team with Mei Lin, landing many hits triggers marks, and both are Passion
sereniel_epi_shiningcore_1: Generates 2 lasers at the start of the battle and every time you break ravage
sereniel_epi_shiningcore_3: Creates 2 lasers but increases their number of uses
sereniel_epi_hominglaser_1: Moves to your hand at the start of each turn, including the first
sereniel_epi_hominglaser_2: Creates more lasers that help with combos.
sereniel_epi_hominglaser_3: More Afterglow, which means more ravage
sereniel_epi_plasmamissile_1: Applies Weakness to Instinct and increases laser damage
sereniel_epi_plasmamissile_3: Deals heavy damage to enemies with high ravage / bosses
sereniel_epi_cobaltlight_1: Adds Retain, allowing it to be used in better situations
sereniel_epi_cobaltlight_2: Can hit up to 8 times, and with Weakness Attack it applies ravage
sereniel_epi_cobaltlight_3: Reduces its cost with each use of this card (only if you trigger Ravage)
sereniel_epi_paleshootingstar_1: When used, it activates the laser that generates more lasers, causing this card to generate them as well (only if you have that laser Epiphany)
sereniel_set_1: Sereniel applies a lot of Ravage, so lasers usually apply the set very well (do not use with Selena's recharge)
sereniel_set_2: General set, just aim for the best stats
home.title: Shahoran
home.subtitle: Character guides and tools for your favorite games
game.chaos.title: Chaos Zero Nightmare
home.comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
home.comingSoon.text: More games and guides will be added soon.
footer_follow: Follow me on my social networks:
